website_summaries.verdict: Sporting a pair of men’s KEEN Rialto II H2s translates to a kind of trail experience where comfort and protection take center stage. It is also something worthy of recommendation thanks to its one-to-one fit and astonishing surface traction. That said, every good thing this Keen product has on offer may only be accessed past its premium price tag.Nonetheless, the Rialto II H2’s defining qualities still make it a sandal deserving of many hikers’ patronage.
pros: According to a number of reports, the KEEN Rialto II H2 runs true to size
This sandal built for trail adventures is considered a highly recommendable product by several hiking enthusiasts
Its fantastically comfortable confines have wowed less than a handful of patrons
The protectiveness of this airy hiker, especially at the forefoot, is enough to stun a few outdoorsy folks
An owner deeply admires the Rialto II H2’s remarkably grippy outsole
The footgear’s excellent underfoot support resonates well with a verified purchaser
cons: This sturdy sandal-type hiker from KEEN may scare away some buyers with its rather steep asking price

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not 100 percent waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for multiple creek crossings on a tropical hike. Only problem is that the cushioning absorbs water and makes annoying squishing sound while walking out of water for a good deal of time. The cushioning is nice when not wet.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Samons

customer_reviews.title: No other shoe has been as comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely the most comfortable shoes I have warn in over a decade. I wear size 11.5 Adidas, so I ordered 11.5 Keen, and the fit is perfect. Comfortable with or without socks. I didn't try them in water. Quality is good, as expected. I don't want to take them off.
customer_reviews.author: BubbaChive207

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding as usual!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd pair I have bought of these in the last 5 years. I still have, and wear, the other 2 pair. They are well made, easy to wash, wear well and are incredibly comfortable. They have better arch support and longer lasting soles than my last 3 pairs of tennis shoes. These are virtually all I wear unless it is bitterly cold out.
customer_reviews.author: Jasen Durand

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, but doens't dry fast.
customer_reviews.text: They fit great, as per normal shoe size, and super comfortable. I use them as sandals, i.ee, I wear them in and out of water. However, they do not dry fast... they took more than a day to dry after being in water.... not great for in and out of water use.
customer_reviews.author: Georgette

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed at all
customer_reviews.text: I was not a fan of the insole of this sandal. Perhaps it is that I am used to the Keen Newport line, but this sole was sticky and it only after wearing them for 2 days, I could tell a major difference in the memory foam type sole.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, versatile, breathable and rugged sandals!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are multipurpose and awesome! Perfect for any type of outdoor activities. Breathable, comfortable and protective! They are a little on the heavy side so if you looking for a super lightweight sandal look elsewhere, but if your in the market for a rugged, comfortable sandal that you can take to.the beach, the stream, or the mountain than you should give these a try!
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: second pair - just like the first.
customer_reviews.text: These shoe/sandals are perfect - fit, comfort, air circulation. It's my second pair.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: American made. Not true.
customer_reviews.text: Well I rarely comment but lately I’ve been trying to purchase American made products I’m willing to pay more just because I think its important to support our fellow Americans when we can. I purchased these sandals under the guise that they were American made. Said so in the ad. Not true. Very disappointed .
customer_reviews.author: lawrence paulhus

customer_reviews.title: Really comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Wanted this for an all around summer shoe. I ended up hiking and caving with these the first week I had them, didn’t need to be broken in and they held up great, comfortable all day and no hot spots or blisters.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Heintz

customer_reviews.title: Quality sandal
customer_reviews.text: I wear and ordered a 9 1/2 , they fit perfect. Nice looking , comfortable ,pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable heel strap
customer_reviews.text: Softer sole which my son likes a lot and has an adjustable heel strap!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I use this for hiking on trails and streams. It works
customer_reviews.author: WalkerI

customer_reviews.title: Love these sandals
customer_reviews.text: I wear these all the time. I use the sandals each and every day and love the fit.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Tried in the house, and they’re very comfortable. Beach trial comes in another month.
customer_reviews.author: Stan Rice

customer_reviews.title: Cool and Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable to wear for a lot of walking. Walked into water at the beach and dried out quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Carney

customer_reviews.title: Made in USA?
customer_reviews.text: This was almost perfect except my previous pair was made in the US ,
customer_reviews.author: jval

customer_reviews.title: Very good sandal's
customer_reviews.text: These are probably the most comfortable and durable sandals I have ever owned. I've had them for about 5 years now and wear them in the summer and winters too here in California. I love the adjustable strap on the heel. I have no idea how many miles I have put on these shoes during this time but it has been a lot and they still look like new. When, and if, these ever do wear out, I will buy another pair!
customer_reviews.author: Retired Dan

customer_reviews.title: Best and most comfortable sandal in a long time.
customer_reviews.text: I originally went with my family to REI, And three of my family members and it up buying these pair. I highly recommend these because they are definitely the most comfortable and I can’t wait to use them on the watercraft.
customer_reviews.author: Ninebelow

product_meta.title: KEEN Rialto II Walking Shoes - AW19
product_meta.description: Keen Rialto II Walking Sandals We built this versatile, wear-anywhere sandal in Portland, Oregon, using the finest materials from around the world. It's comfortable and durable, with a higher-traction sole. Waterproof Upper Constructed using a premium waterproof leather, the Keen Rialto II Walking Sandals keep water at bay so you can walk with confidence no matter what the weather. Having a water resistant shoe will improve comfort, durability and offer a wider range of protection to help you gain the maximum from your footwear. A breathable quick-dry lining helps to ensure a constant supply of fresh, cool air that works to cool at all times Sweat and moisture build-up can be wicked away as it as it's produced then transferred to the outer layers to be easily evaporated. The lace-lock bungee system ensures a secure and stable fit for the foot, it can be easily and quickly adjusted whilst on the go. Lastly, a molded rubber guard protects the toe from loose debris and rocks. PU Midsole A PU midsole yields superb cushioning properties allowing you to walk further for longer. Holding excellent cushioning abilities, the midsole absorbs shocks as you move throughout the gait cycle providing resilient cushioning and reducing the risks of potential injury. The midsole also boasts excellent durability and aging resistance ensuring longevity no matter how many miles you rack up. A microsuede lining PU foot ensures ample underfoot cushioning and all-around comfort. An integrated arch support provides all-day-long comfort and ensures long-lasting stability. Completing the midsole is cleansport NXT which ensures your feet remain protected every walk, but so do your shoes; the cleansport NXT natural odour control means that the inside of the shoe remains as durable as the outside. The combination of durability, comfort, and support creates a shoe that allows for optimum performance ensuring you last even longer, even in the snow. Non-Marking Rubber Outsole A non-mark
feature_bullets: Lace-lock bungee system allows for quick adjustments and a preferred fit. Hydrophobic mesh lining quickly dries the foot area and provides excellent breathability. Removable PU foam footbed is lined with a soft microsuede top cover for added underfoot comfort. Metatarsal ridge for natural underfoot support. Cushioned PU midsole for excellent shock absorption and added underfoot support. Non-marking, high-traction rubber outsole with pronounced lug pattern for excellent grip. Imported. Measure
Take on the land and sea in total comfort with the quick-drying and timelessly durable KEEN® Rialto II HR closed-toe sandal!
Polyester webbing upper is washable and quick drying.
Closed-toe travel sandal features a PFC-free, durably water-repellent construction.
Cleansport NXT™ technology offers a natural odor control that provides a fresher foot environment.
